description: JR was a little hesitant and nervous his first time in front of a camera but really got comfortable as Collin kept reassuring him everything would be OK. It also helped for JR to see Collin undress and beckon him to get closer. Eventually he did not even remember there was a camera recording the whole thing. He really enjoyed his first time and Collin. Now I cannot get him to stop calling me to get him all set up with his second time.
title: Boy Crush
